lead_paragraph: GREENBERG--Barbara Sue, devoted daughter of Adolph and Esther Schoenfeld, loyal wife of 63 years to Jack Greenberg, beloved and fiercely protective mother to Amy, Nancy and Michael, uncritical (despite herself) and supportive mother-in-law to Tony and Valerie, and spellbound and adoring grandmother to Emma, Hope, Alex and Matthew Kronman and Jonathan, Matthew and Zoe Greenberg, passed away peacefully on Monday, March 28 at the age of 91. We will carry her with us in our hearts into the golden futures she so sorely wished for us all. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  GREENBERG, BARBARA SUE

We will carry her with us in our hearts into the golden futures she so sorely wished for us all. 1/3
